mapper.insert: insert into member(memNo, email, password, name) values(seq_member.nextval, #{email},#{password},#{name})
mapper.update: update member set authkey=#{authkey} where memNo=#{memNo} and email=#{email}
update member set authstatus=#{authstatus} where memNo=#{memNo} and authkey=#{authkey}
mapper.select: select * from member where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
